\begin{document}

    
    

\section*{Final Problem 3 Simulation}

\begin{verbatim}
clear; close all; clc

X = random('Exponential', 1, [1e6,1]);
Y = random('Exponential', 1, [1e6,1]);
Z = random('Exponential', 1, [1e6,1]);

U = X./(X+Y);
V = (X+Y)./(X+Y+Z);
W = X+Y+Z;

w = 0:.01:30;
v = 0:.01:1;

pdV = fitdist(V,'Beta');
pdfV = pdf(pdV,v);

pdW = fitdist(W,'Gamma');
pdfW = pdf(pdW,w);

figure(1)
histogram(U,'Normalization','PDF');

figure(2)
hold on
histogram(V,'Normalization','PDF');
plot(v,pdfV,'LineWidth',2);
hold off

figure(3)
hold on
histogram(W,'Normalization','PDF');
plot(w,pdfW,'LineWidth',2);
hold off

%plot(pdU);
\end{verbatim}
